title: For Sale: N172 Old Judge Billy Sunday
author: ternst17

posts.post_title: For Sale: N172 Old Judge Billy Sunday
posts.post_content: I’ve got this N172 Old Judge Billy Sunday 446-3 PSA 1 for sale. Asking $1500 shipped. PayPal FF preferred. As always, would be interested in trades for Des Moines Old Judge cards I still need.
Price reduced to $1400 FF shipped. Card is also listed on eBay at a higher price.
Also open to partial trade offers. Most interested in Des Moines Old Judge cards, but open to other cool 19th century pieces.
